description.text: Kartavya is a national non-profit voluntary organization (registered under Societies Registration Act XXI, 1860 with registration no. S/63750/2008) run by the students and the alumni of IIT (ISM) Dhanbad and other associated colleges with the vision to equip the children of slums with education, life skills and character that they need to lead empowered lives.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: A world where everyone has equal opportunities to realize their full potential, regardless of their background or circumstances. A society where no one is considered underprivileged, and every individual can thrive.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Upliftment of underprivileged communities, especially children living in slums, by ensuring access to education, healthcare & basic necessities; empowering women, eliminating social evils, striving for a future where our support is no longer needed.
